sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT [WATERMARK]
  FROM [adf].[CT_IGSQL03_TABLES]
  where TABLE_NAME = '@{pipeline().parameters.pm_ViewName}'
  and DATABASE_NAME = '@{pipeline().parameters.pm_DatabaseName}'

Select max([Sys_RowNumber]) as NewWatermark FROM [edw].[@{pipeline().parameters.pm_ViewName}]
where Sys_RowNumber > @{variables('v_Watermark')}

text.value:
create view [edw].[@{replace(replace(replace(replace(join(split(pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName,' '),''),'_',''),'-',''),'(',''),')','')}]
as

SELECT 
cast([timestamp] as bigint)as [Sys_RowNumber],
@{concat(join(variables('ColumnString'),',' ) )} FROM dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}]

if object_id('edw.@{replace(replace(replace(replace(join(split(pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName,' '),''),'_',''),'-',''),'(',''),')','')}', 'V') 
is not null drop view [edw].[@{replace(replace(replace(replace(join(split(pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName,' '),''),'_',''),'-',''),'(',''),')','')}]
